name: Apple
description: A crisp, juicy red fruit packed with fiber.

name: Banana
description: A soft, sweet fruit rich in potassium.

name: Orange
description: Citrus fruit loaded with vitamin C.

name: Strawberry
description: Bright red berries with a sweet flavor.

name: Grapes
description: Small, juicy fruits that come in bunches.

name: Pineapple
description: Tropical fruit with a spiky shell and sweet yellow flesh.

name: Watermelon
description: Large, juicy fruit with a green rind and red pulp.

name: Blueberry
description: Small blue fruits rich in antioxidants.

name: Mango
description: Sweet tropical fruit with golden flesh.

name: Peach
description: Soft, fuzzy fruit with a sweet and juicy taste.

name: Kiwi
description: Small brown fruit with bright green, tart flesh.

name: Papaya
description: Tropical fruit with orange flesh and black seeds.

name: Pomegranate
description: Fruit with juicy red arils packed with antioxidants.

name: Guava
description: Tropical fruit with a sweet, floral flavor.

name: Lemon
description: Sour yellow citrus fruit often used in drinks.

name: Lime
description: Tart green citrus fruit used in cooking and drinks.

name: Raspberry
description: Tiny red berries with a slightly tart flavor.

name: Blackberry
description: Dark purple berries that are juicy and sweet.

name: Cherries
description: Small red fruits with a pit, sweet or tart.

name: Coconut
description: Tropical nut with white meat and refreshing water.

name: Pear
description: Sweet fruit with soft, grainy flesh.

name: Plum
description: Juicy fruit with smooth skin and a pit.

name: Fig
description: Soft fruit with many tiny seeds and a sweet taste.

name: Dragon Fruit
description: Exotic fruit with vibrant skin and speckled flesh.

name: Starfruit
description: Yellow tropical fruit shaped like a star.

name: Passion Fruit
description: Small fruit with a tough rind and sweet-tart pulp.

name: Cantaloupe
description: Melon with sweet orange flesh and netted rind.

name: Honeydew
description: Sweet melon with pale green flesh.

name: Apricot
description: Small orange fruit with a tangy flavor.

name: Jackfruit
description: Large tropical fruit with sweet yellow pods inside.

name: Ackee
description: Tropical fruit native to West Africa, known for its savory flavor when cooked.

name: Rambutan
description: Spiky red fruit with juicy, sweet translucent flesh inside.

name: Salak (Snake Fruit)
description: Brown scaly-skinned fruit with a sweet and tangy taste.

name: Mulberry
description: Small purple or red berries with a sweet and tart flavor.

name: Jabuticaba
description: Brazilian fruit that grows directly on the tree's trunk; tastes like grape.

name: Soursop
description: Green spiky fruit with white, tangy pulp inside used in juices and desserts.

name: Longan
description: Small brown tropical fruit with translucent sweet flesh.

name: Miracle Fruit
description: Berry that makes sour foods taste sweet after eating.

name: Bael Fruit
description: Hard-shelled fruit from India with sweet aromatic pulp used in drinks.

name: Breadfruit
description: Large tropical fruit with potato-like flesh, often cooked or baked.
